textos_fuente.text: Myerlee Country Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Fort Myers Golf Communities Myerlee Country Club Myerlee Creek Country Club is a semi-private executive golf club in Fort Myers, Florida. A par 60 golf course designed by well-known architect Arthur Hills. In addition to the golf course, the club offers a chipping and pitching area to practice your short game. Following your round, be sure to stop in the clubhouse for a beverage and meal and relax while you enjoy your 19th hole! The course is surrounded by condos and villas. Additionally, homeowners may own their own golf cart and pay a trail fee to the club. Members, guests and visitors are welcome to enjoy the course at reasonable rates. The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities,. Contact us today for more information. Location: Fort Myers Club Type: Semi-Private Membership Type: Up-front Initiation Fee Real Estate Home Prices Single Family: Not Applicable None in this Community Condos: $160,000 – $530,000 View Condos for Sale The Naples Golf Guy Team has more than 20 years of experience helping Buyers and Sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida. Call, text, or email us today for more information. Stay informed with automatic property alerts… Learn what your home is worth… Sign up for our monthly market report Membership Information Maximum Number of Memberships No Cap on Golf Memberships Is Membership Required? No Non-Resident Memberships Available? Yes Membership Fees Golf Membership Initiation Fee: $4,181 Annual Golf Dues: Call for more information Social Membership Initiation Fee: $318 Annual Social Membership Dues: Call for more information Please be aware, all categories of membership may have additional fees such as a food and beverage minimum that may apply. Also, some Naples private country clubs currently have a waiting list. Please feel free to contact me for additional information. Golf Course Information Number of Courses 1 (18 Holes) Caddies Available No Practice Range No Own your own cart Yes Course Ratings / Scorecards Opened 1971 Architect Arthur Hills Par: 60 Holes: 18 Yards Rating Slope Back 3509 59.2 102 Regular 3261 58.4 99 Ladies Tees: Forward 2972 55.1 86 Amenities Non-Gated Golf Community One Golf Course Clubhouse Tiki Bar Where is Myerlee Country Club Located Myerlee Country Club 1380 Myerlee Country Club Blvd. Fort Myers, FL 33919 239.481.1440 Visit Club Website Back to Fort Myers Golf Communities Note: We make every effort to make sure our information for this Golf Club: Myerlee Country Club is current and accurate. Information about the tees and membership change over time. Please feel free to email us at info@naplesgolfguy.com if you see any information that needs to be corrected. Stay in the know by subscribing to our newsletter Enter your email address 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com ©2025 Naples Golf Guy Privacy Policy Accessiblity made by exploritech We serve cookies to analyze traffic and customize content on this site. Privacy & Cookie Policy Got It! Manage consent Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. Necessary Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Cookie Duration Description cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics". cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional 11 months The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional". cookielawinfo-checkbox-necessary 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookies is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Necessary". cookielawinfo-checkbox-others 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Other. cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Performance". viewed_cookie_policy 11 months The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data. Functional Functional Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features. Performance Performance Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. Analytics Analytics Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads. Others Others Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. SAVE & ACCEPT

Meet Our Dedicated Team | The Woodlands Country Club, TX × Thank you for visiting our site. Please review our Privacy Policy . We use cookies on our site and collect other information pursuant to our Privacy Policy. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy and data collection practices. OK Skip to Content Calendar Opens in new tab Member Login Find A Club Opens in new tab Careers The Woodlands Country Club Main Site Navigation Our Story Golf Amenities Membership Host An Event Join Now Host Event Contact Us Contact Us Login - Opens in new tab Menu Our Story Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Golf The Refinery Insperity Invitational Lessons & Programs Tournament Course Player Course North Course West Course Palmer Course King General Deacon Amenities Racquet Sports Dining Blu Pool Fitness Membership Host An Event Tournaments & Outings Weddings Events Meetings & Corporate Event Rooms Contact Us Calendar Opens in new tab Member Login Find A Club Opens in new tab Careers Login - Opens in new tab Home Our Story Our Team Our Story Calendar Directions & Hours Meet Our Amazing Team David Sizelove Regional Manager Contact Me David.Sizelove Contact Me + Close David Sizelove information modal David Sizelove Regional Manager Serving since 2023 David.Sizelove David.Sizelove Contact Me Contact Me Menno Ozinga General Manager | Palmer Contact Me Menno.Ozinga Contact Me + Close Menno Ozinga information modal Menno Ozinga General Manager | Palmer Serving since 2023 Menno.Ozinga Menno.Ozinga Contact Me Contact Me Robin Kremen General Manager | The Trails Contact Me Robin.Kremen Contact Me About Robin + Close Robin Kremen information modal Robin Kremen General Manager | The Trails Serving since 2015 Robin.Kremen Robin.Kremen Contact Me About Robin Born in New Jersey. Moved to Houston in October 80Graduated Culinary Institute of America. Worked at Cellar in Sky World Trade Center, Sheraton Corporation, Junior League of Houston, Bon Appetite, Lakeside Country Club and Bay Oaks Country Club.Over Thirty years in Food Service13years as a Invited Employee.Team member Texas Chefs Association George W Bush Presidential inauguration reception, Economic Summit Rice University.Culinary Institute of America – Culinary Team Member25 years as a member Houston Livestock Show & Rodeo, Chairman 2 timeWife Tracy, son Gregory, Daughter ElizabethStarted at the Woodlands CC in February Contact Me Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Contact Me Jesse.Regalado Contact Me + Close Jesse Regalado information modal Jesse Regalado Club Manager | Tournament Serving since 2022 Jesse.Regalado Jesse.Regalado Contact Me Contact Me Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Contact Me 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber + Close Amber Sickafoose information modal Amber Sickafoose Membership Director Serving since 2010 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose 281-845-4886 Amber.Sickafoose Contact Me About Amber Amber holds a BS degree in Marketing from Bellevue University. She started her career as a Director of Marketing for a financial company but quickly decided that sales was her real passion. Her golf career began in 2009 for The Woodlands Country Club as a membership director for both The Oaks and Panther Trail courses as well as The Woodlands Country Club courses. She is a very active member in the community and a graduate of Leadership Montgomery County class of 2013. Contact Me Jason Lippy Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason + Close Jason Lippy information modal Jason Lippy Membership Director Serving since 2015 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy 832-810-5876 Jason.Lippy Contact Me About Jason Jason comes to Indian Wells Country Club by way of Desert Falls Country Club in Palm Desert, where he spent the four years as General Manager / Membership Director. Before moving to California in 2015, Jason spent the previous 12 years working as General Manager / Membership Director for Glen Oaks Country Club, a Invited Affiliate Club in Louisville, Kentucky. 

Jason has worked in the golf business his entire career, starting in the Golf Shop at The Polo Fields Country Club when he was only 16.  He then moved to Glenmary Country Club to join the Membership Sales Department. Eventually becoming Club Manager at Glenmary Country Club.  Jason is a graduate of Western Kentucky University’s Broadcasting Department and has also worked covering college basketball and football for ESPN.  Jason’s interests include playing golf, spending time with his wife and eight year old daughter exploring the Coachella Valley. Contact Me Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Contact Me 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell + Close Mitchell Putnam information modal Mitchell Putnam Membership Director Serving since 2014 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam 832-810-5872 Mitchell.Putnam Contact Me About Mitchell Email:  Mitchell.Putnam@clubcorp.comMitchell holds a BS degree in Criminal Justice from Sam Houston State University. He was born and raised in Houston Texas. He joined the Invited family as Service Captain at Willow Creek Golf Club in 2014, eventually becoming the Membership Director in 2017. He joined The Golf Trails of The Woodlands team in 2018 as the Membership Director. He enjoys playing golf, fishing, and watching Houston sports teams play. Contact Me Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-801-4103 Annemarie.Mckay Contact Me About Annemarie + Close Annemarie McKay information modal Annemarie McKay Event Sales Director Serving since 2015 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay 281-801-4103 Annemarie.McKay Contact Me About Annemarie Annemarie is originally from Allen, Tx. She holds a Bachelor’s degree in Hospitality Administration from Stephen F. Austin State University, located in the small town of Nacogdoches, Texas. Annemarie started her career with Invited as a college intern at Stonebriar Country Club in Frisco, Tx. After she graduated, she was hired on fulltime as their Private Event Coordinator assisting with corporate and social events. Annemarie then moved forward in here career and stepped into the role of Private Event Manager at the Las Colinas Country Club in Irving, Tx. There she continued to build her range of events and added Golf Tournaments to her portfolio. She had the privilege of working on events such as George W. Bush Presidential Center’s Warrior Open and the 2015 Volunteers of America North Texas LPGA Shootout. Annemarie recently moved to Houston to further pursue her passion for private events and is proud to call the Woodlands Country Club home, as their Private Event Director. Contact Me Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Contact Me 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke + Close Brooke Tyler information modal Brooke Tyler Event Sales Director Serving since 2009 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler 281-339-8085 Brooke.Tyler Contact Me About Brooke Brooke Tyler is a graduate of The University of Texas at Arlington with a degree in Public Relations. She moved to the Houston Area in 2004 where she started her career in the hospitality industry. She worked for Marriott International for five years as an Event Manager planning various events ranging from corporate, social, to weddings. She began her career at The Woodlands Country Club in 2009 as an Event Manager where she planned Member Events, Member Association Events and Golf Tournaments. In 2012, she took over the Private Event Manager role where she focused on selling and executing all private events for The Woodlands Country Club. She has had the pleasure of working with many members, clients and brides to successfully implement their event. Some of her most favorite memories have been made at The Country Club. She has made some of her closest friendships while working here, as well as meeting her husband, Wes.
